DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether dialysis filter AN69ST ( Nephral 400 ST Dialysis Membrane ) induce less clot hemodialysis conventional polysulphone filter . Our hypothesis two filter induce degree clotting .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Nephral 400 ST Dialysis Membrane Coagulation Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: Six consecutive hemodialysis ( HD ) session evaluate per patient , altogether 10 - 12 stable HD patient ( least 48 HD session altogether ) . During six session , AN69ST Fx8 use alternate day . Dalteparin give intravenously single bolus dose start HD ( 50 % conventional dose ) . Clinical clotting evaluate visually hour HD blood drain venous air trap : 1=no clot , 2=a fibrinous ring , 3=a clot < 1 cm , 4=a clot > 1 cm 5=coagulated system ( stop HD ) . Blood specimen take start hour HD . Markers coagulation ( prothrombin 1+2 ) platelet ( beta-thromboglobulin ) evaluate well anti FXa-activity . The two filter go compare statistically respect degree clinical clotting intravascular coagulation platelet activation .
DOC.criteria: patient age 18 year chronic HD least 1 month dialysis time least 4 hour 3 time per week blood flow least 200 ml/min Fragmin dose unchanged last week study start Fragmin give intravenously one single dose HD start Haemoglobin > = 11.0 g/dL stable +/ 20 % last week study start erythropoietin iron dose unchanged last week study start write orally informed consent give patient treatment acetylsalicylic acid ( ASA ) use Warfarin another oral anticoagulant clinical sign infection disseminate malignant disease
